title: promo bug
body:
Well i was in promo for bronze 3 and i lost my first promo game , then the next day i came and i wasnt in promo and i had 79 lp 
i saw my game history and it was all good and no one played on my account , i had 2 more promos one day , and the next i have 79 lp, is  this a bug ?
and today i won another ranked game an it gave me 20 lp , now im at 99 
BUT RIOT WHAT HAPPENED TO MY PROMO GAMES ?

replies.body:
Maybe you did dodge when you are in promo! 

Ps: this forum is Italian! :-)

Did you dodge some games while you were in promo?

I mean, did you exit from the champion select?

Btw this is the italian forum.
